page.title: 19Play areas in Newtyle
page.content: I often play down at the{park.}There is a chute,swings,a rocking horse,a round-about,a full size football pitch (where Newtyle Hearts play),and a small pitch for the children. There is a big{bowling green}and a club house for grown- ups.There are two{badminton clubs.}Members play in the school hall and the church hall. Lots of people play golf at{Alyth {Golf Club}(six miles away) and if you want to play{tennis}you go to Meigle (three miles away).There used to be a golf course in Newtyle but it is now a grass field.When there is snow I go {sledging}there.Near Belmont Arms Hotel there is a{curling pond. I sometimes play at Denend which is a wooded gulley.There was an old corn mill there. Andrew Crumley Primary 6.
